definition: Nezha, protection deity
(emphatic sentence-final particle, used instead of 啊[a5] after a word ending in "n")
which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)
how/which
used for the sound "zha" in certain names
variant of 咤[zha4]

sentences.english: Li Tian Wang was Nezha's father.
sentences.chinese: 我写西游记中的，李天王是哪吒的父亲。

definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]

Nüwa (creator of humans in Chinese mythology)
Muzha, a figure in Chinese mythology
Houyi, mythological Chinese archer whose wife was Chang'e

the pagoda bearing god
Gyuumao
Zhong Kui (mythological figure, supposed to drive away evil spirits)/(fig.) a person with the courage to fight against evil
